Name: ObservationDefinition
Description: Definition of an observationElements defined in Ancestors: id, meta, implicitRules, language, text, contained, extension, modifierExtension

Name: category
Description: Category of observationObservation Category Codes (Example)

Name: code
Description: Type of observation (code / type)LOINC Codes (Example)

Name: identifier
Description: Business identifier for this ObservationDefinition instance

Name: permittedDataType
Description: Quantity | CodeableConcept | string | boolean | integer | Range | Ratio | SampledData | time | dateTime | PeriodObservationDataType (Required)

Name: multipleResultsAllowed
Description: Multiple results allowed

Name: method
Description: Method used to produce the observationObservation Methods (Example)

Name: preferredReportName
Description: Preferred report name

Name: quantitativeDetails
Description: Characteristics of quantitative results

Name: customaryUnit
Description: Customary unit for quantitative resultsUCUM Codes (Extensible)

Name: unit
Description: SI unit for quantitative resultsUCUM Codes (Extensible)

Name: conversionFactor
Description: SI to Customary unit conversion factor

Name: decimalPrecision
Description: Decimal precision of observation quantitative results

Name: qualifiedInterval
Description: Qualified range for continuous and ordinal observation results

Name: category
Description: reference | critical | absoluteObservationRangeCategory (Required)

Name: range
Description: The interval itself, for continuous or ordinal observations

Name: context
Description: Range context qualifierObservation Reference Range Meaning Codes (Extensible)

Name: appliesTo
Description: Targetted population of the rangeObservation Reference Range Applies To Codes (Example)

Name: gender
Description: male | female | other | unknownAdministrativeGender (Required)

Name: age
Description: Applicable age range, if relevant

Name: gestationalAge
Description: Applicable gestational age range, if relevant

Name: condition
Description: Condition associated with the reference range

Name: validCodedValueSet
Description: Value set of valid coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition

Name: normalCodedValueSet
Description: Value set of normal coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition

Name: abnormalCodedValueSet
Description: Value set of abnormal coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition

Name: criticalCodedValueSet
Description: Value set of critical coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
